Activity: Log in to the system and check emails, including any updates from @EHR Integration Developer and @Data Analyst.
Meet with @Clinical Lead to discuss the current status of EHR collection and clarify any outstanding issues.
Review the current electronic health records data and identify any missing datasets for the influenza trend analysis.
Coordinate with @Health Informatics Specialist to validate the integrity of existing health records.
Work on a progress report of the EHR collection for the management meeting scheduled later in the week.

Discuss integration timelines with @EHR Integration Developer and gather input on challenges faced during current integration.
Check in on project management tools and update the project's EHR collection timelines.
